short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wiping Donald Trump's face off of websites can improve your web-browsing experience, 'people are saying it'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donald Trump is a brown stain on the history of the USA and your browser needs help to wipe it clean. This replaces 'Donald Trump' with 'Donald Buttwipe' and justifiably replaces images of him with toilet paper.
